title: St. Jude Novena - Miraculous Prayer for Hopeless Causes
description: St. Jude Thaddeus was one of the Apostles of Jesus Christ. Pray this novena for hopeless causes, desperate situations, and grave illnesses.

In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

Most holy Apostle, St. Jude, faithful servant and friend of Jesus, the Church honors and invokes you universally, as the patron of difficult cases, of things almost despaired of. Pray for me, as I feel helpless and alone. Intercede with God for me that He bring visible and speedy help where help is almost despaired of. Come to my assistance in this great need that I may receive the consolation and help of heaven in all my necessities, tribulations, and sufferings, particularly: (mention request here‚Ä¶) and that I may praise God with you and all the saints forever. I promise, O Blessed St. Jude, to be ever mindful of this great favor granted me by God and to always honor you as my special and powerful patron, and to gratefully encourage devotion to you. Amen.

May the Most Sacred Heart of Jesus be adored, and loved in all the tabernacles until the end of time. Amen. May the most Sacred Heart of Jesus be praised and glorified now and forever. Amen St. Jude pray for me and hear my prayers. Amen. Blessed be the Sacred Heart of Jesus Blessed be the Immaculate Heart of Mary Blessed be St. Jude Thaddeus, in all the world and for all Eternity. Our Father Hail Mary Glory Be

In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

Answered Prayers From This Novena

I prayed this novena after watching our son struggle for years with a health issue. St. Jude has been answering my prayers for intercession! Our son is steadily improving and returning to his previous state of positivity. Thank you St. Jude!

from M.P.D.

Greetings,

I don‚Äôt know where to start this but I have been praying to God for 8 months now and asking St. Jude to intercede for me.

I have been crying my eyes out several nights and days praying for a miracle to the point that as I write you think email I am almost giving up.

I know you probably get most emails saying they got there prayers answered but that‚Äôs not the case for me . I am a young single mother , with a nine months old daughter. I have been praying to get a well paying job but instead I lost the only source of income I had . I have been praying to get to a better house and neighborhood but instead I have been unable to pay rent for two months now in the house I am currently staying at . I have applied to more than 50 jobs and I haven‚Äôt gotten a single job offer.

I don‚Äôt know how St Jude works but honestly I feel heavy burdened and almost giving up. It‚Äôs gotten to a point I feel suicidal and I know the church frowns upon this but it‚Äôs my reality.

Please pray for me to get the strength to see tomorrow and that God may hear and answer my prayers.

My Mom has canker sore for 3 weeks. I prayed the novena for her while taking her last medicine for 2 weeks, it the canker sore will not be healed, she will undergo biopsy. I know my Mom is scared and I really prayed hard for her, 1 week passed, the sore is still there, after 9 days, the wound is closing, after 2 weeks, the Doctor declared that it healed and just a canker sore and not anything serious. Thank You Lord God, thank You St Jude! May you continue to bless my Mom with good health. Thank you!

Thank you Saint Jude for your intercession. Prayers for my son were answered. Praise Jesus.

Now that the results are out, we feel less tension. The email announcement came out at her birthday. A nice birthday gift from us.

from C.N.

Thank you St Jude for my son successfully getting employment. I am so grateful.

And I started interviewing for the company (simultaneously I got calls from other 2 companies as well) and by the end of the novena I secured the job. All praise to St.Jude, Jesus and Mumma Mary.

Many years ago I said a prayer to St. Jude asking for Wisdom. On the eighth day I had a dream of St. Jude. In the dream I said ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs Thaddeus, it‚Äôs Thaddeus, and he laughed and said ‚ÄúYes‚Äù. At the time I didn‚Äôt know that Thaddeus and St. Jude are the same person. He showed me , in my dream, a man taking a big step the face of whom I would never forget. I woke up feeling that something was going to happen in the future. One day I signed up for an English course at my local college and when I saw the professor I knew profoundly that he was the man in my dream. I proceeded to have an affair with him even though I was married. It ended badly. I went back to my husband and I have been happily married ever since. I learned the hard way that Wisdom is to follow the Ten Commandments. Believe in God and Jesus Christ!!!

I have been paying for all his necessities which has been hard. My son did start a job this past week. Thank you Jesus and St. Jude. I will continue praying to St. Jude for my son‚Äôs health. St. Jude - pray for us.

Long story short, my best friend tried committing s*icide, and after getting help I didn‚Äôt hear from her for a few weeks. I was really worried, so I started praying this novena. The day I finished the novena, I got an email from her saying she was okay and doing much better! I know for certain this was St. Jude, and I am currently praying the novena again for a relative of mine.

Thank you St. Jude for your intercession!!

I thought about writing this because I wanted to thank St. Jude for an answered prayer, It was a prayer for an exam, I asked Him and the Lord that for me to continue with this course of mine then I must prove to myself that I am worthy, I must top the exam, and I only did that prayer for one day okay just one day like It was 5 days before the exam but I only did it in one day yet, when the results came out I topped our exam. Thank You St. Jude! Thank You Mother Mary! Thank You Sr. Santo Nino. Thank You Birhen Capelinha De Fatima! Thank You St. Joseph of Cupertino. THANK YOU LORD!

I pray that whoever is reading this and whoever is praying the novena, may we all achieve what we ask for and may we all believe in the power of the Father, The Son, and The Holy Spirit. Praise Be to God, Praise be to Jesus Christ!

from D.R.

I thank St Jude for interceding for me for my daughter to get a good job. It‚Äôs a miracle because the chances were very slim. A miracle did it. Thanks again for interceding to God. Amen.

from C.D.

My long time bf and I fought 4 days before his flight, it was so hard that I was so down and overthinking like what if we couldn‚Äôt fix it and we won‚Äôt be able to see each other again, my bf will be moving abroad. I‚Äôve heard abt this prayer for a long time but I didn‚Äôt pray it yet since I wasn‚Äôt sure what to specifically ask, and I want to be specific.

So the time has come and I did the novena, I asked him to fix us and let us see each other before his flight. The second day, he gave it to me! I also asked help on St. Valentine, St. Francis of Assisi, St. Rita Cascia, and St. Raphael the Archangel and to all the other saints. Thank you Saints for interceding with my prayer, thanks to St. Jude Thaddeus for your novena that has never known to fail. As promise, I will continue doing this novena. Thank you God, for answering my prayers, thank you Mama Mary for helping me. Today is my bf‚Äôs flight and we managed to fix it yesterday night, we decided to see each other and fix things and it was all good now. To God be the Highest Glory! Thank you St. Jude Thaddeus!

from D.Z.

I want to thank St.Jude for interceding on a prayer my family has been worried about for over a year and thank him for his speedy help.

It is a miracle for my husband to be offered a job right now.

from T.B.K.

I thank God through St. Jude. I am seeing answers to the prayers and intentions we seek from God. Please pray with me that God may complete the good work of healing, restoration and provision which he has started. Amen. Amen. Amen.

from M.D.

Thank You God. Thank you St. Jude. I have found a new home in a safe area. My prayers for healing and peace for my loved ones have been answered. No life is perfect, but You have made mine better.

from K.L.

Thank you for helping my daughter Emily heal from her disease.

from P.F.

i was on very sad moment of my life when i encountered a problem which i thought would ruined me. all of us has our own ups and downs that made us stronger. but on my part it was like a dilema that i cant find ways on how to move out form it. i regret too much of doing things without thinking first on what would be the consequences.

i prayed so hard to God to again help me. i prayed to Saint Jude Thaddeus for help. I always seek guidance and help form him whenever i feel i am in need. This time i pray and pray and ask for help everyday from the moment i wake in the morning.

My heart and soul now is full of gladness and thankful to Lord God and St Jude for all the answers. He always help me in desperate times were solutions to everything seems so far. Thank you Lord. Thank you St. Jude Thaddeus for always helping. I will continue praying and spread the novena to others.

from S.S.M.

Thank you St Jude for answering my prayer so precisely. I lost my job back in May and had to work a notice period. The second time I had found myself unemployed in 3 years. I prayed the novena to St Jude asking that I would not only find work, but also before the end of my notice period. Not only did I find work a week or so before the end of my my notice, it was the job I really wanted. This prayer was answered so precisely that I know it was St Jude‚Äôs intervention through Jesus Christ Our Lord, and I thank him.

from J.J.

I just wanted to share the miracle I experienced through St. Jude when I prayed the novena. I am now in my last semester of nursing school, and I truly believe it‚Äôs thanks to St. Jude‚Äôs intercession. Two years ago, I found out that I had been waitlisted at the only school I applied to. I was devastated and had no backup plan. Fear of the future weighed heavily on me.

In my despair, I decided to pray the novena, giving my worries to God and trusting Him to take care of me. On the last day of the novena, after finishing a night shift at the hospital, I received the call that I had been accepted into the nursing program. I broke down in tears, overwhelmed with gratitude, knowing that St. Jude and God had helped me in some way to make this possible.

I shared the news with my family and told them how St. Jude had answered my prayer. Looking back now, I am forever grateful, and I cannot wait to devote my life to helping others.

from R.P.

Hi, my name is Jane. St. Jude has been my Patron Saint since I was 15 years old. I am now 70. I went in a 30 mile walk. when I was 15 I felt I needed to continue but at the finish line I collapsed and my parents were told I had suffered a heat stroke.it was then I had prayed to St JUDE and 12 times since. Through cancer , surgeries my own and my children‚Äôs all were granted. Only one was not and I couldn‚Äôt understand, but it would have resulted in a life threatimg error. If you are reading this, I wish you well and believe in St.JUDE.

from J.B.

My boy developed a health disability which affected him physically and mentally. Thank you St Jude for your intercession. I saw him yesterday and he said he felt he was healing and he looked better. Thank you with love.

from M.S.

I found this novena prayer in France, 1999 and it was the first time I heard about this Saint. I was on a desperate situation to find a job. My french was not fluent as in English and I didn‚Äôt know how to get a job there. It was then while going to a church, I found the prayer. I immediately read it and obeyed the instructions mentioned. Started praying the next day and believe me, I was offered a permanent job on the 4th day of the novena. But i still continued praying till the 9th day and offered my thanksgiving.

This was the first miracle received through the powerful intercession of St Jude for which I am ever grateful. Eversince he has helped me in many impossible situations. Thank you St Jude!

from M.V.

My husband was buried yesterday. It was a graveside funeral and we really needed the sun and that is exactly what we got. My gift from Saint jude.

from M.B.

I have been through alot this year and every time I prayed the St Jude novena my prayers have been answered. I want to thank the Lord for the answered prayers and the prayers he is yet to answer me.Thank you Jesus, thank you St. Jude.

from A.D.

I recently went through a very difficult time due to a medical condition. My initial test results came back positive for a potentially deadly disease. I was terrified, anxious, and felt completely helpless, not knowing what to do or who to turn to. The doctors needed to run follow-up tests, which took almost four weeks. During that waiting period, I turned to prayer. I began praying the Novena to St. Jude, along with the Novena to St. Expedite and the Novena to the Infant Jesus. I went to church every morning, asking God for a miracle, mercy, healing, and forgiveness. After four weeks, the follow-up results came back completely negative. The relief was overwhelming, and I truly believe this was nothing short of a medical miracle through the power of prayer. This experience has deepened my faith, and I sincerely hope that anyone reading this will believe in God and in the power of prayer.

from A.D.

Hello, I would like to share the miracles I am receiving after completing this novena. It moved me from the very first time I prayed it and I decided to continue praying it daily, coming up to two months now.

I have been going through very tough situations for the past year and at age 59 decided I needed to change my job due to a very toxic work environment. I knew it wouldn‚Äôt be easy to find another good job and had no luck for a whole year.

During this same time, my daughter‚Äôs plans for marriage were suddenly upended and the wedding was abruptly cancelled just a few days before the ceremony. Quite apart from the heartache this brought with it, her whole plans for the future went up in smoke and she had to rethink her whole living situation and safeguard for her suddenly changed circumstances. It was very difficult to find a place she liked and could afford but by God‚Äôs grace she found one soon after. However, obtaining financing from the bank proved to be another obstacle to overcome but by that time I had started this novena and miraculously the money she needed was finally approved and hopefully the contract for purchase will be signed in a few weeks.

As for my job situation, it got to the point that I just had to hand in my resignation without another job waiting for me. But guess what, St Jude stepped in again and within 10 days I got 2 job offers, one of which exceeded all expectations. ( Truth to tell I actually didn‚Äôt have any because in the meantime I turned 60 and didn‚Äôt think anyone would bother hiring me..). My belief is I was actually nudged to resign the way I did because looking for a job was getting me nowhere but taking the plunge did.

There‚Äôs plenty more needs sorting out but I believe St Jude‚Äôs intercession will continue aiding both myself and my daughter and I have resolved to never give up saying this prayer on a daily basis for the rest of my life. I wish everyone would.

Thank you St Jude, thank you Lord.

from D.M.

I just finished my 9 day novena to St. Jude for my severe dry eye symptoms after cataract surgery. It has been over 8 weeks now since my surgery. I know St. Jude can help me. Four years ago I had gastro intestinal issues for 7 months and had lost a lot of weight. I prayed the novena to St.Jude and was referred to a doctor who was able to help me. I haven‚Äôt had an issue since then.

from B.R.

Hope you are doing fine and well.

I would like to ask you to publish again this testimony of mine about an answered prayer of St. Jude Thaddeus as my thanksgiving to Him and especially to God.

I am now living in a really far place now and things are not going well between me and the girl that I love, mainly due to misunderstandings. I was hoping to be able to tour her even virtually, but the communication between us became really difficult.

I prayed the Novena and, even if I haven‚Äôt finished it yet on the ninth day, the prayer of being able to contact her was answered and she liked the virtual tour. The impossible became miraculously possible.

Thank you very much once again God, Jesus and St. Jude Thaddeus for answering my prayer in these hard times of mine where no one is listening to me and my griefs. I will certainly remember it and will pay it once I reach Heaven. For now, I will repay it with this testimony so that others can read and believe.

Amen

from N.R.G.

I promised myself that I would share a testimony after completing the St. Jude Novena. My prayer was for relief‚Äîat least some comfort‚Äîfrom the chronic pain I had been battling, which no doctor could diagnose or treat effectively. I prayed to be guided to the right person or the right knowledge that could help me.

As a young woman in my twenties, the thought of living with this pain for the rest of my life left me feeling hopeless and depressed. My miracle did not come immediately after the novena, but I chose to remain hopeful and prayerful. Over time, I felt inspired to dive deeper into research on functional medicine and dietary changes. I committed to a new diet that gave me an energy I hadn‚Äôt felt in months.

Then, about ten days after finishing my novena, I began to notice real relief‚Äîthe pain was not as intense as before. I feel confident that one day, I will fully have my body back.

Thank you, dear God, Jesus, the Blessed Virgin Mary, St. Jude, and all the Angels in Heaven.

from J.N.

As a family we have prayed nine days novena of st. Jude for our son Joseph (who has been in one year‚Äôs internship in America) to have permanent documentation for his stay and work in USA. He did an interview with the American authorities and on the 14th day he was approved. It was really a miracle. Thank you st. Jude for your intercession.

from J.M.

I was really desperate for a job. The current company I work in is collapsing and I was also actively seeking growth opportunities. I had interviewed in several companies and wasn‚Äôt successful. I had hope in one more company and after getting to the final round of interviews I wasn‚Äôt lucky enough. I really needed this job. And I came to Saint Jude wanting him to reverse this decision. I had hope he would.

And guess what? Iam in day three and the company called me to extend the offer because one of the successful candidates got another job.

I am so so so grateful to St Jude.

from Y.K.

I asked St Jude to help sort out a difficult family inheritance decision. It all worked out perfectly and everyone was happy. Thank you St Jude

from C.N.

I thank St Jude for helping us find a space for our small business, I prayed for 9 days despite my sometimes late prayers. We did find the space which we really wanted just after the 9th day of prayer. Last month too, St Jude helped me to pass my board exams, I am a devotee!

from L.F.H.

from A.S.

I thank you, St. Jude, for your powerful intercession and the miracles you have worked in my life. I wish your name is known to the whole world and more people are blessed through you. Praise the Lord!

from N.J.

I used to practice a study method called active recall when preparing for exams, where one tries to recall information from memory instead of just reading it again from notes, but I couldn‚Äôt do that for two semester now but I believe saint Jude has made it happen again through His powerful intercession. After my studies yesterday, I was able to recall almost everything. Praised God!

from O.F.

I would like to publish again another testimony of mine about the miraculous deed through the intercession of St. Jude Thaddeus, so that many other people can get their Graces coming from Heaven.

After the first miracle, I continued to pray another Novena to St. Jude Thaddeus, this time by asking him to help soften and heal especially the internal wounds of my mum, who became uncomprehensive with her behaviour and that hurt other people, including me. It is not her fault: the wounds that she has were done by people who did her wrong (including her parents and family members).

After praying the Novena, unfortunately, what happened was she was ‚Äúawaken‚Äù through not so good events: we unfortunately fought and became silent for overall 7 days. During that time, she was ‚Äúawaken‚Äù because I cried so frequently and intensely, pleading her to change her heart and not to harden it, that will result in hurting her remaining loved ones (namely me and my day, who is overseas for work). The last fight that we had ruined even the what it supposed to be a joyful celebration because of a big feast in our town (yes, we fought that day when everyone else were happy). That night, I told her that all of this must change not because of the influence of other people, but because we just grew differently and that we had other ideas and preferences in life that it does not do harm or do wrong. At the end of the day, she started to change.

Thank you very much once again St. Jude Thaddeus that you helped me answer that prayer, even if it hurts a lot. It helped in a bigger scale to prove that Love, especially God‚Äôs Love, is far greater than everything. I will thank you again St. Jude Thaddeus once I reach Heaven.

God Bless You All, Amen!

from N.R.G

I was at the precipice of desperation from the separation, a separation instigated by a series of strange family events, too painful to recount here.

But Our Lord, and His Holy Mother, through the intercession of St. Jude, the advocate in cases, fraught with incredible sadness, loss and near despair, made the seemingly impossible possible.

Thank you, dear St. Jude.

And may the outcome of this Novena to St. Jude inspire others to seek his intercession in cases where hopelessness and despair try to chip away at Faith.

God always wins‚Ä¶ always! This Novena is proof of this immutable fact of Faith.

from E.G.

My husband does not have cancer. The tumor is benign. Prayed to St Jude for 8 days. My intention was granted on the 9th day.

from K.B.

I have been praying to St. Jude for my NCLEX RN exam and today my prayers were answered. I‚Äôm thankful and forever grateful. To God be the glory.

from M.K.M.

I should be honest, I really rarely post any public comment online ever.

But, for this occasion, I must post this as my gesture of immense thanks and as a testimony to others so that they can reach Love and Hope in their lives.

I started literally in a casual manner to recite the Novena to St. Jude Thaddeus when I visited the chapel of the hospital where I saw it for the first time. At that time, despite I‚Äôm a Catholic devotee, I did not know fully about St. Jude Thaddeus, especially the fact that he maintains the prayers invoked through him.

When I read on the first page of the Novena about the fact that he always fulfils the prayers invoked through him, I started to pray for 9 straight days, praying specifically that the girl that I currently like and Love will soon become my girlfriend. I know strongly and decisively by my heart that she‚Äôs the one I want to spend the rest of my life because I noticed how much we support each other in our ups and downs (and I‚Äôm not in an illusion). At that time, we had a bit a hard time due to her problems mainly with her job and my personal problems and, consequently, we did not talk for some days. I was really afraid to lose her because I had a repeated traumatic past of strong delusions with other girls that I like in the past.

After the 9th day of the Novena, I went to church for the Sunday mass and there was a chance that we either did not meet each other or she would have avoided me. After the mass, I was able to approach her without any difficulty and, after apologizing to her, she wasn‚Äôt angry. Instead, she smiled all the time. Even her eyes literally smiled as well. Those small things are the miracles that God, through St. Jude Thaddeus, made it reality.

Thank you God, Thank you Jesus, Thank you Mama Mary and Thank you St. Jude Thaddeus for your immense help and that you listened to my prayer. I guarantee you all that I will show my thanks when I will reach Heaven one day and that I hope to repay it through service to others Up there. I will keep reciting the Novena to St. Jude in the hopes that I will hopefully soon find a stable job.

For those who are out there and that are in their rock bottom, I guarantee you that God Loves us all and that He will never ever abandons us. Also, if you need desperate help, you can definitely approach St. Jude Thaddeus, asking him for help and recite his Novena for 9 straight days. Just remember, thank God always and thank Him in particular when you reach Heaven and always do good to others.

God Bless You All, Amen!

Yours,

from N.R.G.

More About St. Jude

St. Jude Thaddeus was one of the 12 Apostles of Christ. (Note that he should not be confused with the traitor Judas Iscariot.)

St. Jude is called the ‚Äúbrother of Jesus‚Äù in Matthew 13:55 and Mark 6:3, but we know from Catholic Tradition that this usage means a relative of Jesus, potentially a cousin, as his mother was Clopas, the Virgin Mary‚Äôs cousin.

St. Jude is also called ‚Äúthe brother of James,‚Äù indicating St. James the Less, and Tradition indicates St. Jude was the author of the Epistle of Jude in the New Testament.

Symbols of St. Jude

St. Jude is often depicted with a club, since some sources say he was martyred by being beaten to death with a club.

He is also often shown with a flame over his head, a reference to his presence in the Upper Room at Pentecost, with the Virgin Mary and the other Apostles, where they received the Holy Spirit.

In paintings, St. Jude is shown holding an image of Christ, called the Image of Edessa.

The legend goes that King Abgar of Edessa asked Jesus to cure him of an illness. Jesus responded by making an impression of his face onto a cloth and sent it back to Abgar through his envoy. After Christ‚Äôs crucifixion, St. Jude sent another disciple to King Abgar and immediately Abgar was healed. The king and his kingdom converted to Christianity.

The Martyrdom of St. Jude

After his death, St. Jude‚Äôs body was placed in a crypt in St. Peter‚Äôs Basilica in Rome.

Over the centuries, many people have prayed for his intercession and received help, leading to his designation as the patron saint for hopeless causes. Both St. Bridget of Sweden and St. Bernard were given private revelation that St. Jude was the patron saint of the impossible.

According to one tradition, Saint Jude was martyred in 65 AD in Beirut along with the Simon the Zealot (also an Apostle), executed either by an axe or club.
